acquired_by.comments: Myakka River SP, palmetto and grass meadow, cloudy, warm, breeze, gray sand with some fines

metadata_by.author: Anna Kelbert
metadata_by.comments: Paul Bedrosian: Miswired mag: Hz=-Hx and Hx=Hz; fire ants built a home in the antenna and cut off communication Original magnetic field wiring was Hx Down. Magnetic fields swapped to Hx North. Original magnetic field wiring was Hz South. Magnetic fields swapped to Hz Down.

run.comments: No valid elevation recorded in the GPS.
